#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
typedef unsigned long long int ull;
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    ull a,b;
    while(scanf("%llu%llu",&a,&b) && (a!=0 && b!=0))
    {
        ull f0=0,f1=1,f3;
        int c=0;
        while(1)
        {
            f3=f0+f1;
            f0 = f1;
            if(f1>b)
                break;
            if(f1>=a && f1<=b)
                c++;
            f1 = f3;
        }
        printf("%d\n",c);
    }
    return 0;
}
